stories.original_headline: Scientists find genes that existed before all life on Earth
stories.original_summary: Lifeâ€™s story may stretch further back than scientists once thought. Some genes found in nearly every organism today were already duplicated before all life shared a common ancestor. By tracking these rare genes, researchers can investigate how early cells worked and what features of life emerged fir
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Unearth Ancient Life Sparks Older Than All Creation!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has uncovered wondrous primal enchantments. These ancient life sparks, found in every living creature, existed even before the first whispers of life on our world. By studying these rare glyphs, wizards can learn how the earliest life essences worked.

stories.original_headline: Scientists uncover the climate shock that reshaped Easter Island
stories.original_summary: Around 1550, life on Rapa Nui began changing in ways long misunderstood. New research reveals that a severe drought, lasting more than a century, dramatically reduced rainfall on the already water-scarce island, reshaping how people lived, worshipped, and organized society. Instead of collapsing, Rap
stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Reveal Long Dry Spell Transformed the Mysterious Isle of Moai.
stories.fantasy_story: Scholars have learned new truths about the Mysterious Isle of Moai. Around the year 1550, a terrible Long Dry Spell descended, lasting for over a century, greatly reducing rainfall. This upheaval from nature reshaped how the island's folk lived and worshipped, changing their kingdom's ways.

stories.original_headline: The Toyota Highlander is now a three-row electric SUV with 320 miles of range
stories.original_summary: Toyota unveiled the new 2027 Highlander, a fully redesigned midsize SUV that marks the brand's first three-row electric vehicle for the US market and the first Toyota EV assembled in America. It's a familiar name - Toyota has been selling gas Highlanders for over 20 years - with an all-new powertrai
stories.fantasy_headline: Clan Toyo Unveils New Enchanted Chariot with Great Range.
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Clan of Toyo has revealed its latest marvel: the new Highlander's Chariot. This grand three-row carriage, powered by a wondrous magical engine, can journey for over three hundred leagues on a single enchantment. It is the first such enchanted vehicle forged entirely in the Western Lands.
